name: Bael | Goetic Demon #1
description: Goetic Spirit #1  Corresponding Angel: » VEHUIAH  Ruler: GÖAP  Rank: King (Rex)  Planet: Sun  Element: Fire  Direction: South  Metal: Gold  Color: Yellow  Incense: Frankincense  Zodiac Position: 0-4 Degrees of Aries  March 21st-25th *[March 21-30]  Tarot Card: 2 of Rods [From Azazel]  Candle color: Black  Plant: Fern  Metal: Iron or Gold  Bael is a Day Demon and rules over 66 legions of spirits.  Evocatory Appearance: three heads (Toad, man & cat) or with each form separately  Powers & Attributes: Invisibility  “The First Principal Spirit is a King ruling in the East, called Bael. He maketh thee to go Invisible. He ruleth over 66 Legions of Infernal Spirits. He appeareth in divers shapes, sometimes like a Cat, sometimes like a Toad, and sometimes like a Man, and sometimes all these forms at once. He speaketh hoarsely. This is his character which is used to be worn as a Lamen before him forth, or else he will not do thee homage.”  - Mathers, Samuel MacGregor Liddel: “The Goetia: The Lesser Key of Solomon the King” (1904)  - Correspondences from Liber 777 & The magicians Tables (skinner)  - picture as usual made by myself
